definition: to restore sth to its original state

sentences.english: After the dam was completed, the undisturbed soil samples from the dam were non-dispersive by some experiments.
sentences.chinese: 大坝建成后的坝体原状土样属于非分散性粘土。

sentences.english: When pressure is lost, the air pressure inside the cell meeting general cell is restorable .
sentences.chinese: 当压力失去时，细胞内的空气压力会将细胞恢复原状。

sentences.english: To handle an invalid contract must abide by the principle of restitution .
sentences.chinese: 处理无效合同应当遵循恢复原状的原则。

sentences.english: And the strength of the original soil of side can get its maximal action.
sentences.chinese: 边壁原状土体强度可得到最大程度的发挥。

sentences.english: After a given length of time the buoy sinks itself and is not recovered.
sentences.chinese: 浮标自身下沉，并且不再恢复原状。

sentences.english: Rat harm was not the inevitable outcome of its existence, but man-made.
sentences.chinese: 鼠之成害，非鼠存在之原状，乃人为所致。

sentences.english: Sixty-two percent of investors polled by the CAQ believe the rules mandated by Sarbanes-Oxley should be left in place.
sentences.chinese: 的受访投资者认为萨班斯法案的相关规则应保持原状。

sentences.english: Hand clenched face loosen, crease is not obvious, and can be quickly restored.
sentences.chinese: 用手捏紧呢面松开，折痕不明显，且能迅速恢复原状。

sentences.english: The cases , along with the contents , are being held for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 这些箱子以及内装物品保持原状以供检查。

sentences.english: The compression test and triaxial test of the original loess and remolded loess are carried out.
sentences.chinese: 本文进行了原状黄土和重塑黄土的压缩和三轴试验。

sentences.english: The nitride on oxide layers remains intact .
sentences.chinese: 氧化物表层上面的氮化物保持原状不动。

sentences.english: Julie, our thirteen-year-old typically opts for an original creation of vegetables or fruit.
sentences.chinese: 13岁的朱莉喜欢保留蔬菜或水果的原状。

sentences.english: The broken mirror was reinstated in the twinkling of an eye.
sentences.chinese: 转瞬之间破镜子又恢复了原状。

sentences.english: As the world economy stabilizes, the older relationships should largely return.
sentences.chinese: 随着世界经济趋稳，传统的关系将基本恢复原状。

sentences.english: Line some has been blown to together, but has restored to the original state again soon.
sentences.chinese: 有的线被吹到了一起，但很快就又恢复了原状。

sentences.english: Discrimination of the original loess and disturbed loess is compared and explained.
sentences.chinese: 比较并解释了原状黄土和扰动黄土湿陷性的差别。

definition: to restore sth to its original state
to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
original spot/previous place/where it was before
original position/(in) the same place/normal position/the place where one currently is/in situ
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
